title: Patrick Mahomes
summary: Patrick Lavon Mahomes II[2] (born September 17, 1995) is an American football quarterback for the Kansas City Chiefs of the National Football League (NFL). He initially played college football and college baseball at Texas Tech University. Following his sophomore year, he quit baseball to focus solely on football. In his junior year, he led all NCAA Division I FBS players in multiple categories including passing yards (5,052 yards) and total touchdowns (53 touchdowns). He entered the 2017 NFL Draft and was the tenth overall selection by the Chiefs.
